title: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected Behavior: A menu should popup allowing the user to add breakpoints, marks, etc.

Actual Behavior: However, no menu is displayed.
EB: A popup menu should appear when right clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, providing options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
